2143.subject: SPED
2143.descrlong: Practical field experience course required for all candidates at end of preliminary credential experience.  This field experience requirement, along with SPED 567A, provides practical experience opportunities teaching students with mild/ moderate or moderate/ severe disabilities in k-12 public and non-public school settings.  Supervisor's student evaluations are based on ability to assess, develop IEP's, teaching competency and behavior management.  Offered fall and spring semesters.
